New Records: Rohit Sharma broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for most hundreds at the World Cup
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored a blistering hundred in 63 balls, the fastest by an Indian at an ODI World Cup
Shahidi and Omarzai compiled a 121-run partnership for Afghanistan
Hardik Pandya cleaned up Omarzai with an off cutter, which marked the beginning of the end for Afghanistan
Rashid Khan removed Ishan Kishan, but Rohit just motored along with Kohli

Miscellaneous Highlights: India's top order, led by Rohit Sharma, had a strong display, with Rohit scoring a century and Virat Kohli adding 55* runs
